name: Crypt Keep Of Maka
description:
There was once a bustling kingdom, full of life and energy, until a dragon unveiled itself causing mania and hysteria all over the kingdom. Go forth hero and slay the dragon! Choose between 8 playable characters and fight evil in an rpg-railshooter. Are you up to the challenge?

Godot 3.3.2, Plogue Chipsounds, Plogue Chipcrusher, Aseprite, FL Studio 20, Chevy Ray's Pixel Fonts!


Windows 10
